column7: 金·贝辛格_百度百科.wa-bk-polysemy-hide{display:none;}.wa-bk-polysemy-greeting{height:38px;border:solid1px#ddd;border-bottom-width:0;overflow:hidden;-webkit-user-select:none;user-select:none;}.wa-bk-polysemy-greetingaudio{display:none;height:0;}.wa-bk-polysemy-greetingp{display:none;text-align:center;line-height:2.7;height:38px;}.wa-bk-polysemy-greetingpimg{position:relative;top:1px;width:11px;height:14px;}.wa-bk-polysemy-greetingpi{display:inline-block;position:relative;top:2px;width:11px;height:14px;}.wa-bk-polysemy-progress-bar{height:2px;background-color:#ddd;}.wa-bk-polysemy-progress-bar-occupied{width:0;height:100%;background-color:#008bf8;}.transition-linear{-webkit-transition:width.25slinear;transition:width.25slinear;}.wa-bk-polysemy-speaker-play{background:url(//m.baidu.com/se/static/aladdin/bk_polysemy/loudspeaker_51cd437.png)no-repeat;background-size:44px14px;-webkit-animation-name:speaker;-webkit-animation-duration:1.2s;-webkit-animation-timing-function:steps(3);-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-name:speaker;animation-duration:1.2s;animation-timing-function:steps(3);animation-iteration-count:infinite;}.wa-bk-polysemy-speaker-default{background:url(//m.baidu.com/se/static/aladdin/bk_polysemy/loudspeaker_04_4729721.png)no-repeat;background-size:11px14px;}@-webkit-keyframesspeaker{0%{background-position:00;}42%{background-position:-33px0;}100%{background-position:00;}}@keyframesspeaker{0%{background-position:00;}42%{background-position:-33px0;}100%{background-position:00;}}.wa-bk-polysemy-clamp{max-height:88px;line-height:22px;}姓名：金·贝辛格
